column6: Bulldogs are about the best dogs in the world. Everyone knows that. But when the Leader decides to use a robotic bulldog to steal all of SHIELD's private files, it's up to She-Hulk, Spider-Man and Tigra to clean up after the dog! All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | colorist:Guru-eFX | colorist:Chris Sotomayor | inker:Marcelo DiChiara | penciller:Patrick Scherberger | letterer:Dave Sharpe | writer:Paul Tobin
